workout_file.author: Zwift
workout_file.name: Week 2.3 - Sweet Spot Ramps - 42min
workout_file.description: A sweet spot focused workout where you'll accumulate 42min in total at that intensity.

textevent.message: We have another sweet spot (SST) focused workout in store for today.
Let's get into things with an 8min warmup to start.
Hopefully the pedal stroke is starting to feel more fluid as you warmup.
There's halfway through today's warmup, let's chat about the plan for today.
As you know, we have another SST workout planned for today.
And more specifically 3, 14min ramp intervals, with 3min recovery between each.
With the goal of accumulating 42min at SST over the course of the workout.
Sound like a plan? Nice!
Let's carry on with the warmup here.
Just a bit more, then we'll take it easy for 2min.
Great work! Now, let's bring it down really easy for a couple of minutes at a comfortable cadence.
Take few deep breaths and recover.
The main set is just ahead, remember we're aiming for 3, 14min ramp intervals at SST.
The ramp will start at 85% FTP, and finish at 95% FTP.
With a target cadence of 90-100 RPM.
Ready? Bring your cadence up just a bit now.
Here we go! We're starting off at zone 3, and working up to mid zone 4 with these intervals.
However, you should feel in control from start to finish today.
That's not to say these will be a walk in the park either though :-)
Great work so far here. Keep steadily ramping up through the zones.
Take a quick glance at your heart rate for these intervals too.
Make a mental note of what your heart rate is at this point.
And see if it changes drastically from the 1st to the 3rd interval today.
That data can be informative as to how you're improving over the course of this plan.
Make sure you're sipping those fluids frequently today too - Don't forget to drink.
Especially as you become fatigued.
Just 2min to go! Keep your cadence nice and high as the intensity continues to rise up.
Homestretch here! Push yourself all the way to the arch!
Way to go! That was a great initial effort today!
Let's take a quick 3mins rest now and we'll repeat that interval twice more.
All right, interval #2 is just ahead. Same thing as before :-)
Right back to zone 3 again and 90-100 RPM here.
Find that rhythm and settle into it quickly again.
Form check: Shoulders relaxed? Elbows bent slightly? Light grip on the bars? Perfect!
How does your heart rate look now compared to the 1st interval?
Seeing a slight increase is normal, but it should still be coupled nicely to the power.
Feeling a bit of fatigue at this point is completely normal.
Sweet spot work is great bang for the buck, but definitely not easy.
Coming into the closing minutes of our 2nd interval now - Keep the cadence elevated here.
C'mon now, finish this final minute STRONG!
Way to go! That's 2 down and just 1 more to go.
Let's take a few minutes nice and easy again here, then gear up for the finale!
The final interval of today is just ahead...Make it the best one yet!
Let's go! Squeeze a little more work out of those legs today.
Great work so far! Pushing into zone 4 now.
Let's take a quick glance at your heart rate.
How does it compare to the 1st interval?
Remember, a slight increase is normal, but it shouldn't be anything drastic.
With most coaches agreeing on a less than 5% being ideal.
Fortunately, if you see more than 5%, SST training is ideal for improving it :-)
Don't forget to drink - You should consume about 1 bottle today.
Just 2min to go! Keep your cadence nice and high as the intensity continues to rise up.
Homestretch here! Push yourself all the way to the arch!
Great work today! That was a tough workout, but very high quality.
We'll spend a few minutes cooling down now, then check off another workout.
See you next time :-)
